example.text: We have a misinformation problem in the GOP-led Natural Resources Committee. With some of their legislation, it seems like we’re paving new frontiers in gaslighting. It’s time they stop lying to America and get these unconstitutional, planet-killing policies off our dais. [[url]]
Here are some of the transformative projects in California’s Second Congressional District made possible from funding in the #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw ? ? [[url]]

By putting people over politics, my congressional colleagues and I delivered some truly monumental victories for the country. I hope you'll take a few minutes to read more about the work my team and I have done this past Congress.

We have a misinformation problem in the GOP-led Natural Resources Committee. With some of their legislation, it seems like we’re paving new frontiers in gaslighting. It’s time they stop lying to America and get these unconstitutional, planet-killing policies off our dais. [[url]]

This new standard from [[user]] is a necessary and important protection as we wean off our dependence on fossil fuels. It’d be a massive improvement for the health of our planet and communities that are being choked out by Big Oil pollution. [[url]]

This is just the latest in my work to keep the Capitol free from firearms - I have led multiple letters to leadership calling for a ban on Members carrying weapons, and just last week I sounded the alarm over reduced security measures under Republican leadership. Standing up to Dirty Oil : I led a letter to Special Presidential Envoy for Climate John Kerry opposing the appointment of Sultan Al Jaber, a top executive of one of the world's largest oil and gas companies, as the leader of the UN Climate Conference (COP28).

Other Priorities I'm Working On: Funding Wins for the North Coast : For the second year in a row, I was able to secure funding for special projects right here in California's 2nd district. I'm happy to report that $12.4 million for 14 of our Community Project funding requests made it into the 2023 funding bill and were passed into law - bringing our total Community Project funding up to $23.9 million for 23 projects!
